amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the requirement for annual state reading and math tests for grades 3 through 8 and retain current law for state assessments.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 107-69 to strike language requiring annual state assessments in reading and math for grades 3-8 and retains current law for state assessments which requires that states measure students in all subjects on which the state has developed standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hoekstra amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 255 (Roll no. 130).
